title: HavanaVS
author: HavanaVS
content: Hello,Hiring discord/telegram moderators for crypto projects, please reply or send a DM with your telegram or discord if you are interested.Thank you

comments.body: Quote from: HavanaVS on November 06, 2023, 06:56:38 AMHello,Hiring discord/telegram moderators for crypto projects, please reply or send a DM with your telegram or discord if you are interested.Thank youPlease count me in . I am perfect fit for this role . TG : t.me/ccmsme

comments.author: Stedsm
comments.body: Send me a message via telegram - @MrBitcoiner

comments.author: bhadz
comments.body: Can you leave both of your contacts (Telegram and Discord) so that anyone can contact you anytime? I don't have experience yet in moderating discord and telegram but I've got moderation experience in other platforms. What are your requirements and qualifications? and how many are you hiring?

comments.author: CCMS
comments.created_time: November 07, 2023, 01:27:11 PMLast edit: November 08, 2023, 04:11:10 PM by CCMS
comments.body: Quote from: bhadz on November 07, 2023, 10:33:05 AMCan you leave both of your contacts (Telegram and Discord) so that anyone can contact you anytime? I don't have experience yet in moderating discord and telegram but I've got moderation experience in other platforms. What are your requirements and qualifications? and how many are you hiring?He hasn't contacted me yet though .Update : Received message from Alexandru Constantin on 8th Nov

comments.body: Quote from: CCMS on November 07, 2023, 01:27:11 PMQuote from: bhadz on November 07, 2023, 10:33:05 AMCan you leave both of your contacts (Telegram and Discord) so that anyone can contact you anytime? I don't have experience yet in moderating discord and telegram but I've got moderation experience in other platforms. What are your requirements and qualifications? and how many are you hiring?He hasn't contacted me yet though .Well, he said that your contacts have been saved and he might just contact you anytime soon. He could just be busy in the real world and that's why no DMs yet come to you.Quote from: GxSTxV on November 07, 2023, 02:39:25 PMSimply the op is searching for a job not service providers. You should read the topic well before replying here.I've read it several times but it seems that he's looking to hire people and not looking for projects to hire him.

comments.author: wallet4bitcoin
comments.body: I have vast experience in moderation both on discord and also on telegram, I have actually been moderating communities for over 4 years, I have also sent you a DM with my telegram and Discord usernames.I actually have moderated SMF as a global moderator. I have the skillset to deliver on the Job. If gigs for such jobs avails itself, I am more than ready to take it up ASAP, whether for this particular OP or coming from any one who is in need a Moderator to deliver on a job.

comments.author: SosSpagetti
comments.body: Hi, I'm MaxÂ  from emoneymax.net.We can offer you excellent moderators with long experience. Besides that, we have a great advertising team that could help your project grow.DM here or on Telegram: @maxmeriss.

comments.body: Messaged some of you! I hope we will collaborate in a great way!

comments.author: Bushdark
comments.created_time: November 17, 2023, 06:21:34 PMLast edit: November 18, 2023, 02:19:43 PM by Bushdark
comments.body: This dude is a pro scammer and I still don't know why you guys are applying for this shit when he has no project in hand.He keep creating new account here and changing his discord name so that many of his victim will not notice. He would send you a link to join his discord community which is full of bots. You will also be instructed to verify your account and if you ignorantly opt in, your account login details would be acquired and will be used to hack your discord account. Be careful guys! I know you will delete this but it's okay ðŸ˜‚
